channel.title: Compile error
channel.description:
Hello. i was just wondering how come when i change somonething in client.java such as any text like when you log in it says welcome to server. i want to change that and all i done was change [code]sM("Welcome to server.");[/code] to [code]sM("Welcome to BannedFromHeaven.");[/code] . then i save and then i compile and turn server on and it still says welcome to server. Also i changed
[code]public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public void customInterface(){ //grey patterned interface clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Close Window", 3024);//Close Text sendQuest("Welcome To Banned From Heaven", 3026);//Welcome To Banned From Heaven sendQuest("Owner = mur", 3027);//Owner = mur sendQuest("Admins = ffs, orenge juice", 3028);//Admins = ffs, orenge juice sendQuest("Mods = Sincardia, David, Sean ", 3028);//Mods = Sincardia, David, Sean sendQuest("LOOKING FOR DEDICATED STAFF! apply on forums", 3029);// sendQuest("***************", 3030);//YOU NEED THE CLIENT sendQuest("YOU NEED THE CLIENT ", 3031);//GO TO FORUMS FOR CLIENT! sendQuest("http:*********************", 3032);//Starters do ::pure sendQuest("Dont Ask For Money Or Admin", 3032);******* sendQuest("", 3036);// sendQuest("Enjoy!", 3037);//Enjoy! showInterface(3023); flushOutStream(); }[/code]
To
[code]public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public void customInterface(){ //grey patterned interface clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Close Window", 3024);//Close Text sendQuest("Welcome To Banned From Heaven", 3026);//Welcome To Banned From Heaven sendQuest("Owner = Mur, Orenge Juice, Owner", 3027);//Owner = Mur, Orenge Juice, Owner sendQuest("Admins = ffs, orenge juice", 3028);//Admins = ffs, sendQuest("Mods = Sincardia, David, Sean ", 3028);//Mods = Sincardia, David, Sean sendQuest("LOOKING FOR DEDICATED STAFF! apply on forums", 3029);// sendQuest("****************", 3030);//YOU NEED THE CLIENT sendQuest("YOU NEED THE CLIENT ", 3031);//GO TO FORUMS FOR CLIENT! sendQuest("http://*********** is link for forums", 3032);//Starters do ::pure sendQuest("Dont Ask For Money Or Admin", 3032);//*********** sendQuest("", 3036);// sendQuest("Enjoy!", 3037);//Enjoy! showInterface(3023); flushOutStream(); }[/code] I Then saved Compiled and it is still the same as before... Note the *** are there because it was advertisement.
Alough i was thinking it may have something to do with this error becuase everytime i compile i get this error... I never paid any attention to it before becausse it seemed like my server was ok and it got up and runnin fine.
Heres the compile error [code]client.java:2763: illegal start of expression || playerEquipment[playerWeapon]==4827 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon]==7158 | | playerEquipment[playerWeapon]==1319) { ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Please tell me whats wrong thanks [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 27, 2009, 10:57:06 am[/size][hr]By the way. i cant compile nothing i tried changing the starter then compiled and it didnt work at all

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @kaoticvela74 kaoticvela74
item.description:
@kaoticvela74 wrote:

It looks like when you added that last weapon wrong, a logical fix would be too copy a working phrase, like the one before it, and past it, and then change the item ID. Either that or you ended it wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

GO LOOK AT WHERE YOUR ERROR IS! DON’T JUST START ASKING QUESTIONS!
“client.java:2763: illegal start of expression”
What do you think that means?..

Read full topic

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hello. i was just wondering how come when i change somonething in client.java such as any text like when you log in it says welcome to server. i want to change that and all i done was change sM("Welcome to server."); to sM("Welcome to BannedFromHeaven."); . then i save and then i compile and turn server on and it still says welcome to server. Also i changed

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public void customInterface(){ //grey patterned interface clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Close Window", 3024);//Close Text sendQuest("Welcome To Banned From Heaven", 3026);//Welcome To Banned From Heaven sendQuest("Owner = mur", 3027);//Owner = mur sendQuest("Admins = ffs, orenge juice", 3028);//Admins = ffs, orenge juice sendQuest("Mods = Sincardia, David, Sean ", 3028);//Mods = Sincardia, David, Sean sendQuest("LOOKING FOR DEDICATED STAFF! apply on forums", 3029);// sendQuest("***************", 3030);//YOU NEED THE CLIENT sendQuest("YOU NEED THE CLIENT ", 3031);//GO TO FORUMS FOR CLIENT! sendQuest("http:*********************", 3032);//Starters do ::pure sendQuest("Dont Ask For Money Or Admin", 3032);******* sendQuest("", 3036);// sendQuest("Enjoy!", 3037);//Enjoy! showInterface(3023); flushOutStream(); }

To

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public void customInterface(){ //grey patterned interface clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Close Window", 3024);//Close Text sendQuest("Welcome To Banned From Heaven", 3026);//Welcome To Banned From Heaven sendQuest("Owner = Mur, Orenge Juice, Owner", 3027);//Owner = Mur, Orenge Juice, Owner sendQuest("Admins = ffs, orenge juice", 3028);//Admins = ffs, sendQuest("Mods = Sincardia, David, Sean ", 3028);//Mods = Sincardia, David, Sean sendQuest("LOOKING FOR DEDICATED STAFF! apply on forums", 3029);// sendQuest("****************", 3030);//YOU NEED THE CLIENT sendQuest("YOU NEED THE CLIENT ", 3031);//GO TO FORUMS FOR CLIENT! sendQuest("http://*********** is link for forums", 3032);//Starters do ::pure sendQuest("Dont Ask For Money Or Admin", 3032);//*********** sendQuest("", 3036);// sendQuest("Enjoy!", 3037);//Enjoy! showInterface(3023); flushOutStream(); }
I Then saved Compiled and it is still the same as before…
Note the *** are there because it was advertisement.

Alough i was thinking it may have something to do with this error becuase everytime i compile i get this error… I never paid any attention to it before becausse it seemed like my server was ok and it got up and runnin fine.

Heres the compile error

client.java:2763: illegal start of expression || playerEquipment[playerWeapon]==4827 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon]==7158 | | playerEquipment[playerWeapon]==1319) { ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Please tell me whats wrong thanks
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 27, 2009, 10:57:06 am[/size][hr]By the way. i cant compile nothing i tried changing the starter then compiled and it didnt work at all

Read full topic
